name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Python**, **Django**, **FastAPI**, and **Microservices** architecture. Proficient in **SOLID** principles, OOP, and design patterns such as MVC and MVVM, with a strong focus on **RESTful API** development and optimizing application performance. Demonstrated expertise in database optimization, caching strategies, and implementing clean, maintainable code through **Code Quality**, **Clean Code**, **DRY**, and **KISS** principles. Knowledgeable in algorithms related to data structures, sorting, and searching methods to enhance application efficiency.

Well-versed in deploying scalable solutions across **AWS** and **Azure** environments while ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Additionally, skilled in building AI/ML-powered applications and MLOps practices for orchestration and model serving using **MLflow** and **Airflow**.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed robust backend solutions leveraging **Python** and **FastAPI**, ensuring adherence to **SOLID principles**, **Design patterns**, and **OOP** practices for efficient, scalable architecture.
Engineered RESTful APIs to support microservices architecture, optimizing for **database performance** using **PostgreSQL** and implementing **caching strategies** for enhanced response times, achieving query performance improvements of up to **50%**.
Created and maintained clean, efficient code by following **Clean Code** principles, incorporating **Code Quality** checks and **Profiling** practices that reduced application bottlenecks by **30%**.
Implemented advanced **Dependency Injection** techniques to enhance modularity in the application structure, resulting in a **20%** reduction in code complexity and improved maintainability.
Contributed to the application optimization process, identifying and resolving issues related to **Memory Management** and **Data Structures**, leading to a **40%** improvement in resource utilization.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products, emphasizing thorough testing and validation using tools like PyTest to achieve **100%** test coverage for critical components.
Utilized **MVVM** and **MVC** design patterns to ensure effective data flow, providing a seamless development experience across frontend and backend integration.
Engaged in regular code reviews to uphold **Clean Code** standards and foster a culture of knowledge sharing within the engineering team, enhancing overall team productivity by **25%**.
Developed backend services that integrate effectively with modern frontend frameworks, ensuring seamless communication through clearly defined **RESTful APIs** and promoting best practices in API documentation.

• Engineered microservices architecture utilizing **Python** (FastAPI, Django) to elevate the core financial platforms' scalability and performance, effectively managing **9 million** transactions per day.
• Developed RESTful APIs in **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) for seamless client-server communication, ensuring reliable service with **99.9%** uptime.
• Implemented optimized code practices following **SOLID** principles, ensuring high-quality software with minimal technical debt and improved maintainability.
• Created interactive front-end applications using **Vue.js** (3) and integrated with state management libraries like Redux Toolkit for delivering high-performance financial tools.
• Devised event-driven architecture employing **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** for efficient asynchronous workflows crucial for processing payments, alerts, and compliance tasks.
• Designed and operated ETL pipelines to process financial data from various sources with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory**, delivering both batch and real-time analytics.
• Developed machine learning models using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost** for fraud detection, harnessing historical transaction data to boost detection accuracy by up to **85%**.
• Implemented ML pipelines using **MLflow** and **Airflow** for real-time credit scoring and transaction classification tasks, significantly optimizing backend service integration.

• Designed and optimized backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Python** (**Django**, **FastAPI**) to ensure adherence to OOP principles, implementing **SOLID** design patterns to enhance maintainability and scalability across key modules like checkout and order fulfillment.
• Developed RESTful APIs leveraging **Django** for microservices, adhering to **MVC** architecture, ensuring efficient communication between client and server components.
• Applied best practices in code quality including **Clean Code**, **DRY**, and **KISS** principles, resulting in a codebase that achieves a **30%** increase in reliability and maintainability.
• Engineered real-time features using **WebSockets** and **Kafka** for event-driven architecture, enhancing order updates and inventory tracking, which improved user engagement metrics by over **25%**.
• Oversaw database optimizations and implemented **Caching** strategies with **Redis**, achieving a **40%** reduction in database read pressure during peak traffic periods.
• Created documentation and maintained code quality through regular profiling, ensuring adherence to software engineering best practices in memory management and application optimization.
• Developed frontend components in **Vue.js**, ensuring seamless integration with backend services while following the **MVVM**Architectural pattern for interactivity enhancement.
• Collaborated on system designs following **Domain-Driven Design** principles and optimized algorithms for performance improvements, streamlining critical data structures for business logic applications.
• Ensured secure transactions by integrating payment gateways such as Stripe and PayPal, maintaining PCI compliance across transactional processes while ensuring reliable customer experiences.
• Conducted thorough reviews and incorporated feedback loops to implement feature flagging and deployment practices, including **Kubernetes** namespaces, facilitating controlled rollouts and risk mitigation.
